category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PS_ShowUnreadablePlaceholder
preference.preference_description: Activates the display of unreadable lines in applications leveraging Indexed BOM. Valid Values: - true: Unreadable lines are displayed with the name <<UNREADABLE>>. This is the default value. - false: Unreadable lines are not visible.
